Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Killian -- 1% S&U - Clerk of Council - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
TOWN OF KILLIAN
PROPOSITION NO. 1
(SALES TAX)

SUMMARY:  A TEN (10) YEAR ONE PERCENT (1%) SALES TAX FOR OPERATING THE TOWN OF KILLIAN.
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Killian be authorized to levy a ten (10) year one percent (1%) sales tax for operating the Town of Killian. The estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $2,500.00; and shall the town be authorized to fund the proceeds of the tax to pay the costs as follows:  said tax of three eighths percent (3/8%) be used for Roads and Ditches; said tax of three eighths percent (3/8%) be used for Killian Water Works; said tax of one eighth percent (1/8%) for Administrative; and said tax of one eighth percent (1/8%) for the General Fund in the Town Treasury for the use of the town?

Race.SpecificTitle: Recreation Dist. No. 5 -- 15 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
RECREATION DISTRICT NO. 5 PROPOSITION
(TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10-YEAR 15 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR ACQUIRING, IMPROVING AND MAINTAINING RECREATIONAL FACILITIES FOR THE DISTRICT.
Race.FullText: Shall Recreation District No. 5 of the Parish of Livingston, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of fifteen (15) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $200,000) on all property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of acquiring, improving and maintaining recreational facilities for the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Prot. District No. 8 -- 16.63 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT #8 PROPOSITION
 (TAX CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR 16.63 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR MAINTAINING AND OPERATING THE DISTRICT'S FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES, FOR PURCHASING FIRE TRUCK AND OTHER FIRE FIGHTING EQUIPMENT AND PAYING THE COST OF OBTAINING WATER FOR FIRE PROTECTION PURPOSES, INCLUDING CHARGES FOR THE HYDRANT RENTALS AND SERVICES.
Race.FullText: Shall Livingston Parish Fire Protection District #8 of Livingston Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a sixteen and sixty three hundredths (16.63) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $95,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of maintaining and operating the District's fire protection facilities, for purchasing fire truck and other fire fighting equipment and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, including charges for the hydrant rentals and services?
